description: Seberianos kam Sewerianos....[Severiani sive Seberiani Gabalorum episcopi Emesensis Homiliae/Severiani opera in Armenia conservata], Classical Armenian text of the fifteen homilies with facing Latin translation by Mkrtich' Awgerean (Jean-Baptiste Aucher) (Venice, 1827), in 485 pdf pages. File size: 14.9 MB. Yovhannu Oskeberani Kostandnupo'lusi episkoposapeti char'k' [Homilies of John Chrysostom, Archbishop of Constantinople]

is_part_of.title: Online Armenian Catalogs, Philosophical, Patristic, and Theological Materials

title: Seberianos kam Sewerianos....[Severiani sive Seberiani Gabalorum episcopi Emesensis Homiliae/Severiani opera in Armenia conservata]
